spdfcore.stanalys

Class LivenessAcyclic

  • java.lang.Object
    • spdfcore.stanalys.LivenessAcyclic

  • public class LivenessAcyclic
extends java.lang.Object
    The simplest sufficient condition for liveness: the graph must be acyclic.

      • check

        public java.util.LinkedList<Channel> check(Graph graph)
        check the liveness (in this version - whether the graph is acyclic)
        Parameters:
        graph -
        Returns:
        - null if live; if not live throws exception unless told not to do so, then it returns a cyclic path

        visit non-visited successors of the given actor
        Returns:
        - directed cycle if found any
